gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我每個星期會去探望阿姨。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I visit my aunt every week.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měi gè xīngqī huì qù tànwàng āyí.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我的阿姨是一位教師。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My aunt is a teacher.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ de āyí shì yī wèi jiàoshī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 阿姨常常幫我做晚餐。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My aunt often helps me with dinner.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āyí chángcháng bāng wǒ zuò wǎncān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 明天阿姨要來我們家作客。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My aunt is coming to our house as a guest tomorrow.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Míngtiān āyí yào lái wǒmen jiā zuòkè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 阿姨的笑聲很好聽。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My aunt's laughter sounds very pleasant.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āyí de xiàoshēng hěn hǎotīng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 啊，我終於放假了！
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Ah, I finally have a vacation!
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: A, wǒ zhōngyú fàngjià le!

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他想去旅遊啊。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He wants to travel, you know.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā xiǎng qù lǚyóu a.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個問題太難啊！
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This question is too difficult, ah!
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège wèntí tài nán a!

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 明天要下雨啊。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: It's going to rain tomorrow.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Míngtiān yào xià yǔ a.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 啊！我掉了手機！
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Ah! I dropped my phone!
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: A! Wǒ diào le shǒujī!

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他的身高很矮。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He is very short.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de shēngāo hěn ǎi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這座橋很矮。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This bridge is low.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zuò qiáo hěn ǎi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這棟房子太矮了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This building is too short.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè dòng fángzi tài ǎi le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我比他矮一點。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I am a little shorter than him.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ bǐ tā ǎi yīdiǎn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 雲層很低，感覺好像要撞到矮山一樣。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The cloud layer is low, it feels like it's going to hit the low mountain.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Yún céng hěn dī, gǎnjué hǎoxiàng yào zhuàng dào ǎishān yīyàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他的愛好是唱歌和跳舞。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: His hobbies are singing and dancing.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de àihào shì chànggē hé tiàowǔ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我沒有什麼特別的愛好。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I don't have any particular hobbies.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ méiyǒu shénme tèbié de àihào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她的愛好是閱讀和寫作。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Her hobbies are reading and writing.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de àihào shì yuèdú hé xiězuò.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我的愛好是打羽毛球和爬山。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My hobbies are playing badminton and hiking.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ de àihào shì dǎ yǔmáoqiú hé páshān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 你的愛好是什麼？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: What are your hobbies?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ de àihào shì shénme?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 課堂裡應該保持安靜。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: You should keep quiet in the classroom.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Kètáng lǐ yīnggāi bǎochí ānjìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要一個安靜的地方來工作。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need a quiet place to work.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào yīgè ānjìng de dìfāng lái gōngzuò.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡在晚上散步，那時候很安靜。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to take a walk in the evening, it's very quiet then.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zài wǎnshàng sànbù, nà shíhòu hěn ānjìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請保持安靜，不要吵到別人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please keep quiet and don't disturb others.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng bǎochí ānjìng, búyào chǎo dào biérén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個圖書館要求讀者保持安靜。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This library requires readers to keep quiet.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège túshūguǎn yāoqiú dúzhě bǎochí ānjìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我把書放在桌子上。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I put the book on the table.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ bǎ shū fàng zài zhuōzi shàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請把門關上。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please close the door.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ mén guānshàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他把錢放進錢包裡。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He put the money into the wallet.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bǎ qián fàng jìn qiánbāo lǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 那個老師把知識傳授給學生。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: That teacher imparts knowledge to students.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nàge lǎoshī bǎ zhīshì chuánshòu gěi xuéshēng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她把信寄給了她的朋友。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She sent the letter to her friend.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bǎ xìn jì gěile tā de péngyǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我明天有一堂中文班。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I have a Chinese class tomorrow.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ míngtiān yǒu yī táng zhōngwén bān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個班的同學都很友善。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The classmates in this class are all very friendly.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège bān de tóngxué dōu hěn yǒushàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我現在在上大學班。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I'm currently in college.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xiànzài zài shàng dàxué bān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡這個班的氛圍。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like the atmosphere of this class.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zhège bān de fēnwéi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 星期五我們班有一個考試。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We have a test in our class on Friday.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xīngqīwǔ wǒmen bān yǒu yīgè kǎoshì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我需要幫忙搬家。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I need help moving.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xūyào bāngmáng bānjiā.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們將會搬到新公寓。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They will move to a new apartment.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen jiāng huì bān dào xīn gōngyù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們正在計劃搬離這個城市。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We are planning to move out of this city.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen zhèngzài jìhuà bān lí zhèige chéngshì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請小心，別搬到重的物品。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please be careful not to move heavy items.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng xiǎoxīn, bié bān dào zhòng de wùpǐn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我需要一輛卡車來搬東西。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I need a truck to move things.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xūyào yī liàng kǎchē lái bān dōngxī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他的生日是一月半。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: His birthday is on the 15th of January.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de shēngrì shì yī yuè bàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我看了半天，也找不到那本書。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I looked for quite a while and still couldn't find that book.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ kàn le bàn tiān, yě zhǎo bù dào nà běn shū.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我每天早上要運動半小時。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I exercise for half an hour every morning.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měi tiān zǎo shàng yào yùn dòng bàn xiǎo shí.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請你等一等，我只需要半分鐘。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please wait a moment, I only need half a minute.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng nǐ děng yī děng, wǒ zhǐ xū yào bàn fēn zhōng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我拿了一半的錢，你來補一半。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I took half of the money, you contribute the other half.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ ná le yī bàn de qián, nǐ lái bǔ yī bàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們要找一個解決問題的辦法。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to find a solution to the problem.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yào zhǎo yīgè jiějué wèntí de bànfǎ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 你有什麼好的辦法嗎？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Do you have any good ideas?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu shénme hǎo de bànfǎ ma?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他想了很多辦法，才找到了工作。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He tried many methods before finding a job.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā xiǎngle hěnduō bànfǎ, cái zhǎodàole gōngzuò.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 學習的辦法有很多種。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: There are many ways to study.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xuéxí de bànfǎ yǒu hěnduō zhǒng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她用辦法打發了多餘的時間。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She found a way to pass the spare time.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā yòng bànfǎ dǎfāle duōyú de shíjiān.
